sacks:item-handbooktext-floursack: Store more flour in a rush sack fresher longer in a convenient stack (12 per block). Perfect for a kitchen or storeroom.

sacks:item-handbooktext-charcoalsack: Store more charcoal in a rush sack in a convenient stack (12 per block). Perfect for a work room or storeroom.
